base_description: Long, multi-colored object with a sleek design.
part_description: Consists of a yellow top, red sides, black middle strip, and gray ends. The parts are linear and aligned along the length of the object.
internal_interaction_description: The yellow top covers the upper section, while the red sides provide structural support along the length. The black middle strip runs centrally, possibly functioning as a core or track. Gray ends may serve as connectors or stabilizers, holding the structure together.
external_interaction_description: The object may interact with external elements by sliding or fitting into a compatible slot or track. Its design suggests it could be part of a larger assembly or mechanism, potentially manipulated by hand for precision tasks.
